name: 葉奕良
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB 介紹與應用、暫態響應、PID 控制的影響、Lead-Lag 控制的影響、頻率響應、系統判別、控制器設計。
Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming
of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, and Controller Design.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Mathematical models of systems
Week 3-4: State variable models
Week 5-6: Feedback control system characteristics
Week 7: The performance of feedback control systems
Week 8: The stability of linear feedback systems
Week 9: 期中考
Week 10-11: The root locus method
Week 12-15: Frequency response methods
Week 16-17: Experiments
Week 18. 期末考
scorePolicy:
作業 30%
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
平時成績 10%
materials: R. C. Dorf and R. H. Bishop, Modern control system, Pearson, 13th edition, 2017.
